      • getAminoacid

        public static AminoAcid getAminoacid(char aa)
        Converts a chart to an AminoAcid if it matches with one of them
        Parameters:
        aa - the chart to convert
        Returns:
        a corresponding AminoAcid or null if there is not match

      • isAminoAcidSequence

        public static boolean isAminoAcidSequence(String seq)
        Check if the sequence is valid in terms of the letters contained
        Parameters:
        seq - the sequence to check
        Returns:
        true if the sequence is valid, false in other case

      • searchForAminoAcid

        public static List<AminoAcid> searchForAminoAcid(double massRangeStart,
                                 double massRangeEnd,
                                 boolean isMonoMass)
        Search within a mass window (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        massRangeStart - mass window start.
        massRangeEnd - mass window end.
        isMonoMass - choose between mono mass and average mass.
        Returns:
        List returns a list of qualified amino acids.

      • searchForPeptide

        public static List<AminoAcidSequence> searchForPeptide(double massRangeStart,
                                       double massRangeEnd,
                                       boolean isMonoMass,
                                       int numOfResidue)
        Search and return a combination of amino acid according the number of residue specified.
        Parameters:
        massRangeStart - mass window start.
        massRangeEnd - mass window end.
        isMonoMass - choose between mono mass and average mass.
        numOfResidue - number of residues.
        Returns:
        List list of peptides.

      • calculateTheoreticalMass

        public static double calculateTheoreticalMass(String seq,
                              double... masses)
                                       throws IllegalAminoAcidSequenceException
        Calculates the theoretical mass taking into account the mono-mass of every AminoAcid of the sequence and the array of masses passed
        Parameters:
        seq - the sequence to calculate the mono-mass of every AminoAcid
        masses - the extra masses to add to the theorical mass (i.e. PTM or WATTER)
        Returns:
        the theoretical mass
        Throws:
        IllegalAminoAcidSequenceException - if the sequence is not valid

      • calculateDeltaMz

        public static Double calculateDeltaMz(String sequence,
                      double precursorMz,
                      int precursorCharge,
                      List<Double> ptmMasses)
        Calculate the mono delta m/z for the given sequence, precursor m/z and precursor charge If invalid, -1 will be returned.
        Parameters:
        sequence - amino acid sequence
        precursorMz - precursor m/z
        precursorCharge - precursor charge
        ptmMasses - a list of ptm monoisotopic masses
        Returns:
        Double monoisotopic delta m/z

      • calculateDeltaMz

        public static Double calculateDeltaMz(double precursorMz,
                      double theoreticalMass)
        Calculate the mono delta m/z for the given sequence, based on theoretical and experimental mass
        Parameters:
        precursorMz - precursor m/z
        theoreticalMass - a theoretical mass
        Returns:
        Double monoisotopic delta m/z

      • calculatePeptideMonoMass

        public static double calculatePeptideMonoMass(AminoAcidSequence aminoAcidSequence,
                              List<PTModification> modifications,
                              double... massCorrections)
        Calculate peptide's monoisotopic mass.
        Parameters:
        aminoAcidSequence - peptide sequence.
        modifications - a list of modifications.
        massCorrections - a list of mass corrections.
        Returns:
        double final peptide mass.

      • calculatePeptideAvgMass
